statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT energy_level, timestamp FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT location, energy_level FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_level < 50 ORDER BY energy_level ASC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, location FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_level > 75 AND location LIKE 'CA%';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY energy_level DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, energy_level, location FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_level) AS average_energy FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY device_id HAVING AVG(energy_level) > 50
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_level > 80 GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY total_entries DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_devices DESC
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT device_id, energy_production, timestamp FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT energy_production, timestamp FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_production > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_forecast ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT timestamp, forecasted_energy FROM energy_forecast WHERE forecasted_energy BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, energy_production FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_production > 100 ORDER BY energy_production DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, MAX(forecasted_energy) FROM energy_forecast GROUP BY forecast_id;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_production FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY energy_production DESC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_production FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM energy_production;
SELECT device_id, production_level, timestamp FROM energy_production ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM device_info;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT timestamp, device_id, production_level FROM energy_production ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, predicted_level, actual_level FROM forecast_data WHERE predicted_level > 100 ORDER BY predicted_level ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_info WHERE location = 'New York' AND device_name LIKE '%Sensor%';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM device_status ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_level) AS average_energy FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT device_id, online_status FROM device_status WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, energy_level FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_level > 50 ORDER BY device_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 0.0 AND longitude > 0.0;
SELECT device_id, online_status, last_update FROM device_status WHERE online_status = TRUE ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT forecast_id, timestamp, predicted_energy FROM energy_forecast WHERE predicted_energy BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT device_id, timestamp, online_status FROM renewable_energy_production AS rep JOIN device_status AS ds ON rep.device_id = ds.device_id WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01' AND online_status = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM renewable_energy_devices WHERE energy_production > 1000;
SELECT device_name, device_location, energy_production FROM renewable_energy_devices WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_production_data ORDER BY production_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, energy_level FROM renewable_energy_devices INNER JOIN energy_production_data ON renewable_energy_devices.device_id = energy_production_data.device_id WHERE energy_level < 5000;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM renewable_energy_devices;
SELECT device_name, energy_production FROM renewable_energy_devices ORDER BY energy_production DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_production_data WHERE energy_level > 1000 ORDER BY production_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(analysis_id) AS analysis_count FROM energy_analysis_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING analysis_count > 5;
